entities.name: luna lovegood
entities.description: Luna Lovegood is mentioned as a student who knows about Padma Patil's experience at the Yule Ball. She is described as gazing un-blinkingly at Ron over The Quibbler.

entities.name: padma patil
entities.description: Padma Patil is mentioned as a student who went to the Yule Ball with Ron. She is described as not enjoying it very much and feeling that Ron didn't treat her well.

entities.name: anthony goldstein
entities.description: Anthony Goldstein is mentioned as a student who was paired with Padma Patil for the Yule Ball.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as someone who went to the Yule Ball with Padma Patil. He is described as looking mildly surprised when reminded of this by Luna Lovegood.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is mentioned as someone who is trying not to giggle at Ron's reaction to being reminded of his experience with Padma Patil.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as the one who said that Anthony Goldstein and Padma Patil were paired for the Yule Ball.

entities.name: the quibbler
entities.description: The Quibbler is mentioned as a magazine that Luna Lovegood was reading over when she reminded Ron of his experience with Padma Patil.

entities.name: yule ball
entities.description: The Yule Ball is mentioned as an event where Ron went with Padma Patil and Anthony Goldstein went with Luna Lovegood.

relationships.description: Luna reminded Ron of his experience at the Yule Ball with Padma Patil.
Ron went to the Yule Ball with Padma Patil.
Anthony Goldstein was paired for the Yule Ball with Padma Patil.
